Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Golden Dolphin Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Golden Dolphin Way.
Room.LongDescription: Rosecrest Street and Golden Dolphin Way break off in their own directions, north and east, respectively, meeting here at the southwestern corner of Oceancrest. To protect the citizens, a large observational station has been placed to the south which connects the Southern and Western City Walls, and provides an adequate early warning system for incoming intruders.
